title.rendered: Apply Now | Mount Saint Vincent University Admission Requirements 2024

content.rendered:
Mount saint Vincent University Admission Requirements,international students Requirements,Canadian high School Students Requirements,International Undergraduate tuition & fees (10 courses) $17,671- $18,077.

Mount Saint Vincent University Admission is open for all indigenous and international candidates who want to apply for admission.

 

Mount Saint Vincent University Admission Requirements for International Students:

This is for an applicant whose first language is not English; certified information with satisfactory grade scores from one of the following tests must be submitted:

  • The International English Language Testing System (IELTS)
  • The Canadian Academic English Language (CAEL) Test
  • The Test of English as a Foreign Language (TOEFL)
  • The  CanTEST
  • The  Michigan English Language Assessment Battery (MELAB)

The following test of grade scores specify the English language necessities for international student admission to full-time studies and the language bridging programs at MSVU:

Test Scores for Admission to Full-time Studies at MSVU
IELTS    
7.0 Or above (no score below 6.5)         Full-time graduate studies at MSVU
6.5 (no score below 6.0)                        Full-time undergraduate studies at MSVU
CAEL
70 or above (no score below 70)           Full-time graduate studies at MSVU
60 (no score below 60)                          Full-time undergraduate studies at MSVU
TOEFL (iBT Test)
93 or above (no score below 23)           Full-time graduate studies at MSVU
86 – 92 (no score below 21)                  Full-time undergraduate studies at MSVU
TOEFL (Computer Test) 
236 or above                                          Full-time graduate studies at MSVU
226 – 235                                               Full-time undergraduate studies at MSVU
CanTest              
5.0 (no score below 4.5)                        Full-time graduate studies at MSVU
4.5 (no score below 4.0)                        Full-time undergraduate studies at MSVU
MELAB 
85 or above                                           Full-time graduate studies at MSVU
80 – 84                                                  Full-time undergraduate studies at MSVU

 Mount Saint Vincent University Admission requirements for Canadian high school students:

If you are looking up on how to apply to Mount Saint Vincent University as a high school student, the general admission requirements if you’ve graduated from a Canadian high school are as follows:

  • Grade 12 English (with a grade of 65% or higher in this course)
  • Four additional Grade 12 academic courses
  • An overall average of 70% or higher and
  • No individual grade below 60%

Tuition and Fees for International Student

Undergraduate tuition & fees (10 courses) $17,671- $18,077

 For Graduate tuition
& fees (6 courses) $12,169

 For Room & Board$10,550
